alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 8:09PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong winds near the mountains this evening... Westerly downslope winds, gusting to between 50 and 60 mph, are expected across western portions of El Paso County, generally between I-25 and the mountains, through 9 pm. Locations in and near the Air Force Academy and near Cheyenne Mountain may be some of the windier spots. Winds will shift to the north and diminish somewhat after 9 pm, as a cold front moves through the area, though some gusts of 30 to 40 mph may still be possible until midnight.
